questions.title: 能为我唱《Just One Last Dance》这首歌你真是太好了。
questions.answer: It's very kind of you to sing the Just One Last Dance for me.

questions.title: 无论如何，你能用真心对待我真是太好了。
questions.answer: In any case, it's kind of you to treat me with sincerity.

questions.title: 承蒙送到车站，您真是太客气了。
questions.answer: It is kind of you to take me to the station.

questions.title: 有这么多游客夸奖我们的家乡真是太好了！
questions.answer: It's kind of so many tourists to speak highly of our hometown！

questions.title: 下雨时你能为我带着伞真是太好了。
questions.answer: It's very kind of you to bring an umbrella for me when it rains.

answer.en: It's kind of you to help me.
Don't hold your tongue when you are in trouble.

title: ——让我陪你走完这最艰难的路程。
——你真好！

answer.en: Let me accompany you to finish the toughest journey.
It's kind of you to do that！

title: ——你能为我搜集信息真是太好了。
——很乐意效劳！

answer.en: It's very kind of you to collect information for me.
